name: Custom Browser Automation Agent
description: A powerful custom browser automation agent with multi-provider LLM fallback (Cerebras → Groq → NVIDIA), vision capabilities (Ollama → NVIDIA), and live screenshot streaming. Can navigate websites, interact with elements, extract information, save images from web pages, and stream real-time browser activity to the canvas.

endpoints.description: Execute browser automation task with live streaming. Supports real-time screenshot streaming to canvas.

parameters.name: task
parameters.description: The task description for the browser agent (e.g., 'Go to leetcode.com/contest and find upcoming contests').

parameters.name: max_steps
parameters.description: Maximum number of steps to execute (default: 10).

parameters.name: extract_data
parameters.description: Whether to extract structured data from the page (default: False).
